page.title: 20Farming around Hungerford.
page.content: There are 10 farms in our study area including a Trout farm breeding fish for sale to the public. High Close Farm specialises in pigs devoting some 5 acres to "Large White" and "Landrace" breeds.Each sow has 2.5 litters per year and there are 11 pigs in a litter.The farm breed all their pigs for meat and when they have been reared they are sold to a bacon factory in Chippenhan, Wiltshire.They are then aged 5-6 months.The farm employs 7 stock men and 1 tractor driver.In addition High Close also has given over 4 acres to strawberries, 3 acres to raspberries,1 acre to gooseberries and \ an acre to blackcurrants.Season for these lasts 4-5 weeks and all are sold on a "Pick Your Own" basis.
